explanation: [0-0] A young man with slightly curly hair, wearing a black top, is holding a tennis ball between his right thumb and index finger. A red circle is in the middle of the frame, encircling the tennis ball in the young man's hand. In front of him, there is a red mat on the table with another tennis ball on it. Behind him is a pale yellow cabinet and a purplish-white background wall with a brick pattern.

[0-5] The man then looks at the tennis ball in his hand, brings it to the front of the camera, and shows it. Afterward, the red circle in the middle of the frame disappears. The man squeezes the ball, puts his left hand in front of his mouth in a silencing gesture, puts the ball between his hands, squeezes it, opens his mouth wide, puts the tennis ball in his mouth, and gives a thumbs-up gesture twice to the camera.

[5-9] Then, the young man picks up the tennis ball from the table, shows it to the camera, and knocks on it a few times with his right fist to prove that it won't deform. Afterward, he gives a thumbs-up gesture with his right hand. Then, he takes out an open tennis ball can from the right side of the frame, with two new tennis balls at the bottom.
